titleStmt.title: An answer to the Lord Digbies speech in the House of Commons; to the bill of attainder of the Earle of Strafford, the 21th. of Aprill. 1641. Written by occasion of the first publishing of that speech of his Lordships. And now printed in regard of the reprinting of that speech.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: The Lord Digbies speech in the House of Commons. To the bill of attainder, of the Earle of Strafford, the 21 of April, 1641.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
